index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Human Services Program, amending Ordinance 114906, increasing appropriations in the 1990 budgets of the Department of Human Resources, the Human Services Strategic Planning Office, the Department of Community Development, the Department of Parks and Recreation, and the Seattle-King County Department of Public Health by making an appropriation from the Emergency Fund, partially reimbursable from unencumbered and unexpended balances in the General Fund and Neighborhood Matching Fund to provide for cuts in federal Community Development Block Grant funds and declaring the emergency therefor.
